question: This question concerns my grandmother. She is 88 years old. Has Congestive heart failure, pasemaker, diabetes, spinal stensis, high blood prussure, hypothyroidism, seizures, and past stroke. She is having muscle weakness, that is brought on very fast and goes away just as fast. Example: she can raise her hand and it may fall but a few seconds later she can pick it up or when standing her legs may give out but before she hits the floor she will regain strength in them. Any ideas you have are welcomed.
title: weakness
